mapper.insert: insert into khy_board2(bno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bregdate, bupdatedate, bhit, bdeleteyn) values(#{bno}, #{bid}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, 'Y')
mapper.select: select count(ka.uuid) battachcnt, kb.bno, kb.bid, kb.btitle, kb.bcontent, kb.bregdate, kb.breplycnt, kb.bhit from khy_attach ka right outer join khy_board2 kb on (ka.bno = kb.bno) where kb.bdeleteyn = 'Y' group by kb.bno, kb.bid, kb.btitle, kb.bcontent, kb.bregdate, kb.breplycnt, kb.bhit order by kb.bno desc
mapper.update: update khy_board2 set bdeleteyn = 'N' ,bupdatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno} and bdeleteyn = 'Y'
update khy_board2 set bhit = bhit + 1 where bno = #{bno} and bdeleteyn = 'Y'
